content: दिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दिश् कर्मणि-क्त] {@--1@} Shown, indicated, assigned, pointed out. {@--2@} Described, referred to. {@--3@} Fixed, settled. {@--4@} Directed, ordered &c. --ष्टः Time. --ष्टं {@--1@} Assignment, allotment. {@--2@} Fate, destiny, good or ill-luck; भो दिष्टं <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Order, direction, command. {@--4@} Aim, object.
